turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need to order three medium pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. let me get that order started for you. what kind of pizzas did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: First off, I want extra cheese on all three of them. I wanted just pepperoni for one of them. Their Venice meat pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And that's for the second one. And then for the third one, they're

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mexican special.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That'll I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want regular crust on all of those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, just a normal regular.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me read back your order to make sure i got it down correctly. you want 3 medium pizzas. all with extra cheese. 1 with pepperoni. 1 venice meat pizza, and 1 mexican special.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get that correctly?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, you did.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. the total for the order is $55.69 should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. i've submitted the order. it'll be ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's it, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. enjoy those interesting sounding pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I hope I will.
